name: Doodle Fit
description:
Doodle Fit, the best-selling puzzle game, is finally here! Featuring 12 beautiful themes and 350 tricky puzzles with 600+ solutions. All this gives you more than 15 hours of pure gameplay! Your task in Doodle Fit is simple: fit the sets of blocks into the given shapes. Drag the blocks into position to find a layout that covers the whole shape. A level is complete when all blocks have been used and there is no more space free in the shape.



Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
